name: Crow

trait.name: Mimicry
text: The crow can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Beak
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 302
